text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Reports: 'streamlined' UK asylum process to replace interview with questionnaire for five nationalities
text.summary: On February 23, 2023, after replacing official interviews to determine refugee status in the UK with a new questionnaire for asylum seekers from Afghanistan, Eritrea, Libya, Syria and Yemen, UK Prime Minister Rishi Sunak faced criticism from media and refugee organizations when a leaked letter revealed complicated questions may prevent non-English speakers from completing it.
